argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lcdvbasecl.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | lcdvbasecl.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lcdvbasecl.v | |- V = ( Base ` U ) |
| 4 |  | lcdvbasecl.s | |- S = ( Scalar ` U ) |
| 5 |  | lcdvbasecl.r | |- R = ( Base ` S ) |
| 6 |  | lcdvbasecl.c | |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) |
| 7 |  | lcdvbasecl.e | |- E = ( Base ` C ) |
| 8 |  | lcdvbasecl.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 9 |  | lcdvbasecl.f | |- ( ph -> F e. E ) |
| 10 |  | lcdvbasecl.x | |- ( ph -> X e. V ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 8 | #P_dvhlmod | |- ( ph -> U e. LMod ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LFnl ` U ) = ( LFnl ` U ) |
| 13 | 1, 6, 7, 2, 12, 8, 9 | #P_lcdvbaselfl | |- ( ph -> F e. ( LFnl ` U ) ) |
| 14 | 4, 5, 3, 12 | #P_lflcl | |- ( ( U e. LMod /\ F e. ( LFnl ` U ) /\ X e. V ) -> ( F ` X ) e. R ) |
| 15 | 11, 13, 10, 14 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( F ` X ) e. R ) |
